message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  I think it could be highly beneficial to you. I'm asking for $11,000. Let me know what you think.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value and what I've researched.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and offer.  However, I believe the value of this product is significantly higher than your valuation. I'm willing to come down slightly to $10,500. This is my final offer.
I'm still not convinced that $10,500 is the best price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $10,000. That's my final offer.
